name: Untitled AntiVirus Game
description:
The PC has been infected! They stole important data and its your job to get it back. As the AntiVirus, the PC is relying on you to get the job done.

GOAL
Collect as much of  the missing data as possible. Waves get exponentially more difficult. Collecting data refills your health.

CONTROLS
WASD to move
Shift while moving to sprint
Space to jump
Press and hold space while in the air to use jetpack
Hold shift while using jetpack to hover
Mouse to aim
Left click to shoot
Right click to throw grenade

Music: Bogged Down by Argle
All sound bytes from freesound.org

Josh - Developer & Models
Darion - Developer & Textures
